overview_of_class:
This course is designed to provide students with an opportunity to continue their pursuit of the classical ballet technique with an emphasis on technical development, extended and more intricate movement combinations, including the integration of vocabulary, concepts of dynamics, attack, musicality, body alignment, lines, use of space and artistry challenging the students physically and intellectually.

Students must have taken Ballet I and/or have had previous Ballet Training, and/or have instructor's permission.
name: Ballet II
subject: DANCE
